footer.description: Leader in supplying superior quality electric vehicles for sustainable mobility.
footer.newsletterDesc: Subscribe to receive offers and news
footer.trademark: VITALE is a registered trademark at the Ministry of Economic Development

hero.title: The Future of Electric Mobility
hero.subtitle: Leader in supplying superior quality electric vehicles.
hero.description: Discover our complete range for sustainable and cutting-edge mobility.

asya.title: ASYA
asya.subtitle: ELECTRIC CAR
asya.description1: The new Asya: a two-seater electric car designed for an ecological and cutting-edge driving experience. With a range of 150 km, 7 kW power and a maximum speed of 85 km/h.
asya.description2: The ideal companion for urban and extra-urban driving, with high-efficiency battery and advanced energy management system.

passengerTransport.title: Electric vehicles for passenger transport
passengerTransport.description1: Vitale Italy, our excellence in passenger transport. Designed to offer exceptional performance and powered by sustainable energy.
passengerTransport.description2: The electric vehicle that redefines your concept of passenger transport thanks to 4 seats + 1 for the driver.

cargoTransport.title: Electric Vehicles for cargo transport
cargoTransport.description1: The epicenter of innovation in sustainable mobility, where our company shines as a leader in supplying superior quality electric vehicles.
cargoTransport.description2: We collaborate with a network of trusted dealers to drive the green revolution on the road.

partnership.title: Tailored solutions for your needs
partnership.description1: Becoming one of our dealers is an unmissable opportunity that puts you directly in the driver's seat of success.
partnership.description2: You will have priority access to a complete range of high-quality products, supported by reliable spare parts supply.

values.title: Our Values
values.subtitle: Committed to a sustainable future and mobility accessible to all

freedom.title: Freedom of Movement
freedom.description: Say goodbye to city restrictions and enjoy the freedom of driving a 100% electric vehicle. Ecological and sustainable mobility.

sustainability.title: Sustainable Mobility
sustainability.description: The path to a greener future begins with every step we take towards sustainable mobility. Our cities are changing.

ecobonus.title: Ecobonus
ecobonus.description: Ecobonus is an aid implemented in Italy to promote the acquisition of low-emission vehicles.

contacts.title: Become a dealer
contacts.description1: Becoming a Vitale dealer offers several compelling reasons. First, the company offers a wide range of high-quality electric vehicles, covering different categories.
contacts.description2: Furthermore, Vitale provides comprehensive professional support to its dealers. This includes sales management assistance, product training, marketing support and after-sales services.
contacts.whyVitaleDesc: Exclusive benefits for our commercial partners

qualityProducts.title: Quality Products
qualityProducts.description: Priority access to a complete range of high-quality products

fullSupport.title: Full Support
fullSupport.description: Timely assistance and guaranteed spare parts supply

solidPartnership.title: Solid Partnership
solidPartnership.description: A partnership based on concrete and lasting results

contactForm.title: Contact Us
contactForm.description: Fill out the form to request information about our electric vehicles

cta.title: Ready to join the electric revolution?
cta.description: Contact us today to discover partnership opportunities with Vitale

categoryDescriptions.biciclette: Discover our collection of electric bicycles for sustainable and fun mobility. Perfect for city and extra-urban routes.
categoryDescriptions.monopattini: Practical and manageable electric scooters for fast and sustainable urban travel.
categoryDescriptions.scooter: Powerful and reliable electric scooters for urban and extra-urban mobility.
categoryDescriptions.minicar: Compact and modern electric minicars for sustainable urban mobility.
categoryDescriptions.quad: Powerful electric quads for off-road adventures and difficult terrain.
categoryDescriptions.veicoli-commerciali: Electric commercial vehicles for cargo and passenger transport.
categoryDescriptions.mobilita-disabili: Accessible and safe electric vehicles for mobility of people with disabilities.

product.discoverOther: Discover other models from our range

metadata.title: Vitale - Electric Vehicle Supply
metadata.description: Leader in supplying superior quality electric vehicles. From bicycles to dynamic scooters, from advanced cars to specialized vehicles for people with disabilities. Sustainable and cutting-edge mobility.
